level.text: The holder of an on-premises retailer’s license may file a one-day substantial change request with the Board for permission to have entertainment, extended hours of operation, a cover charge, or dancing not permitted by the applicant’s license as part of a specific event. The one-day substantial change request may be granted, in the Board’s discretion, unless the activities sought by the applicant are otherwise prohibited by the applicant’s ABC license.
Such a request made pursuant to ยง 716.1 shall not be granted by the Board more than six (6) times in a calendar year.
